head.title: Create Round and square stamps in {{FileFormatUp}} using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Generate and insert personalized stamps into {{FileFormatUp}} files with the {{ProdFullName}} API.

header.title: Create stamps for {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: Easily add custom-designed stamps to any part of your documents with {{ProdFullName}}, offering great flexibility for placement and configuration to meet your business needs.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Overview of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a comprehensive tool that lets you insert various signature types into documents, including custom stamps. Supporting over 60 file formats—from PDFs and Word docs to images and ZIP files—you can enhance your documents with text, image, barcode, metadata, digital certificates, and stamps. You also have full control to search, verify, edit, or delete any applied signatures.

more_features.title: Use signatures to secure and improve document integrity
more_features.description: With the {{ProdFullName}} library, you can seamlessly add signature functionality to your documents. Easily create, modify, verify, or delete custom stamps and other signature types, providing flexibility and security for your document workflows.

feature_1.title: Complete document signing
feature_1.content: Elevate your documents by adding signatures like text, images, barcodes, QR codes, and stamps to any position on any page. Manage embedded metadata and apply digital certificates to protect against unauthorized changes.

feature_2.title: Efficient signature search and verification
feature_2.content: After signing, use advanced search tools to find all embedded signatures. Easily verify or manage signature data to ensure document integrity.

feature_3.title: Edit and customize signatures
feature_3.content: Make changes to previously added signatures with ease. Whether you want to change the content, position, size, or color, {{ProdFullName}} gives you full control to adjust signatures as needed.

feature_4.title: Easily remove signatures
feature_4.content: If you need to remove signatures, {{ProdFullName}} offers all the tools necessary to delete any type, including stamps and digital certificates, helping you keep your documents up-to-date and compliant.

formats.title: Apply stamps to various document formats
formats.description: With {{ProdShortName}} API, you can insert custom stamps into more than 60 standard file types. Easily apply stamps anywhere in your documents, improving personalization and tracking.

operations.title: Explore key features
operations.description: Find a wide range of options for creating, managing, and removing signatures, giving you complete control over document workflows.

examples.comment_2: Set up {{StampSignOptions}} with the required stamp details
examples.comment_3: Add one or more lines to the stamp

steps.title: How to add a stamp to {{FileFormatUp}} using {{ProgLang}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) provides robust stamp creation tools for enhancing {{EnvName}} applications. Use it to design and implement custom stamps for your document pages.
content.step_1: Provide the {{FileFormatUp}} document you want to stamp.
content.step_2: Use {{StampSignOptions}} to configure all necessary settings.
content.step_3: Add multiple stamp lines if required.
content.step_4: Apply the stamp and save the updated document.

code_1.title: How to add custom stamps to documents
code_1.content: This example shows how to create and insert custom stamps with specific text details into a document.
code_1.comment_1: Provide the document you want to stamp
code_1.comment_2: Set up the stamp options with your desired settings
code_1.comment_3: Define the stamp’s size and placement on the page
code_1.comment_4: Add outer circular lines with text
code_1.comment_6: Finalize and save the stamped document
